reviews.text: Amber, medium white head. Malty, roasty aroma - some hop notes. Light body, some bitterness, some malty notes. Finishes bitter and a bit malty. Quite good!
Sweet but also hay/ barn like aroma. Medium sour, medium sweet. Also bitterish. Orange colour, but cloudy.
Aromats: Stauts. Mazliet skabusas ogas un citruss. Izskats: Mezgine atri pazud., melns. Garsa: Riepa, bet ne daudz. Labs !!!! Rugtens, tuvaks IPA, mazliet sildoss no chili
